name: Pixel io - Cell Survival
description:
Play in this pixel survival and try to become the biggest pixel of them all!

Control your bright pixel cell and eat other players and pixels to grow larger in agar!
Players bigger than you will be trying to eat you!
Beware of big pixel cells!
Survive and eat all them to become the biggest pixel cell in the game!

+ Simple one touch control, Pixel.io made addictive gameplay!
+ Use splitting tactics to catch other players - or avoid them!
+ Use a variety of super bright skins! Be a cool pixel =)
